body:
This should fix #24237
Seems to be issue with freetype@2.10.3 and later no longer exporting FT_CALLBACK_DEF
See https://gitlab.kitware.com/vtk/vtk/-/issues/18033

This is the vtk-freetype-2.10.3-replace-FT_CALLBACK_DEF.patch
ccorn provided in the above URL, and it sounds like it will be added to a future vtk
title: [vtk] Patch to replace use of FT_CALLBACK_DEF
